column5: Anyone know if there are any "deals" at BPS or Lebarons this week,have the week off and just looking ot nose around,always looking for something I can't use.
Le Barons had there no tax day on sunday but i dont think it's on any more. For BPS i have not seen anything as of yet  By the wa If your not to far from Fishing World they always have great deals
Am over in Whitby, just looking for something to do today,thought i wander around some fishing stores, haha  under the quise of shopping
Hope this helps: BPS Boxing week sale
The Johnny Morris gold series reels are on sale. GREAT reel for the money.
I noticed that reel on sale, I have a pocket full of gift cards I may have to get over there tomorrow and pick one up.  Do you have one Mike?
I do now, I just bought 2.

I think I will pick one up tomorrow. Aaron Shirley has an St.Croix Avid baitcaster for sale and I told him I would take that off his hands, that should be good for the fly-in. You know I can`t go on my first fly-in with old gear!
Nothing too hvy for the pike Gord. In a baitcaster, M/H 12-20lb is good, spinning rod 10-17lb...

Yep boxing day sale is on.. you can get the beautiful Frabil 2/3 man RE2 thermal with the extremely deep sled and nice comfy chairs for $899 vs the $1099 it was last week. Add hyfax, cover and a tow bar and you're still into $1100 + tax !
Wow, a deal like that and I think I'll get his and hers
It is a beautiful hut though... if you don't need to lift it into a truck solo and have a sled to pull it.
